mapper.insert: insert into board(b_title, m_id, b_contents, b_date, b_filename) value(#{b_title}, #{m_id}, #{b_contents}, now(), #{b_filename})
mapper.select: select * from board order by b_number desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: update board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_contents=#{b_contents}, b_filename=#{b_filename} where m_id=#{m_id}
